content: Fox News: Former ICE agent: I arrested over 1,000 illegal aliens, routinely encountered those with voter registration cards. Heritage: Need evidence of voter fraud? We got it. Convictions on 700 defendants. 2014 study by the Electoral Studies Journal estimates illegals cast as many as 2.8 million votes in 2008 and 2010 Fox News: Officials plead guilty in New York voter fraud case. Fox News: Every other country in the world has voter ID. Mexico has voter ID. How are we racist for having voter ID?
